_xResult.title: Pink Lace Confection Ensemble
_xResult.shortdesc: 2-piece custom made lace top and quilted skirt
_xResult.longdesc:
Celebrity designer Ashley Nell Tipton herself will be your personal guide to dress perfection when you order any of her couture made-to-measure garments. You'll talk with her directly as she interviews you to understand your style and fit goals, to personalize your final outfit. You're not just buying a dress, you're stepping into a whole new world of personal service and expert construction.

 

Hey, you! Yes, you! The gorgeous human being reading this right now! I know you're absolutely dying over this crop top set. But, for some reason you need a little more convincing to add this to your closet. So, we'll make this short and sweet: let your inner rockstar burst out in this pink two-piece set!

 

Inspired by her winning collection on Project Runway, this adorable design by Ashley Nell Tipton will win your heart too.

 

The sweetheart neckline paired with the cropped hem accentuates the best portions of your curves. The high waisted flowy skirt gives unbelievable breathability in a feminine pleated shape. Functional pockets and zipper on the skirt makes this ensemble a winner for versatility! Dress this up for homecoming with a nice pair of statement earrings and pumps, or dress it down with a distressed denim jacket and sneakers! Whichever you chose, you'll turn heads for sure!

 

Details:

  • Skirt is midi length (just below knee) made of lush knit fabric with quilting stitch detail and full zipper
  • Lace crop top is features hand-cut scallop edges and elbow length sleeves; it is made of non-stretch lace for better structure, including bust darts to help accentuate your curves but with room to move
  • Top is unlined, wear with camisole or sexy bralette of your own

 

Customization options: 

You may customize sleeve length and skirt length (use the Customizations Request box below to enter specific measurements desired).

properties.propvalue: Top 100% nylon lace; skirt 95% polyester, 5% spandex
